== How can I look into the content of the HDF files? ==

You may need to install a visualization software for this first, dependend on the system you are running on.

An easy to use visualization tool is [http://www-loa.univ-lille1.fr/Hdflook/hdflook_gb.html HDFLook]. A list of visualization software can be found on the [http://hdf.ncsa.uiuc.edu/tools.html HDF software page]
